tool_description: Tracks and manages the progress of client intake and onboarding processes, providing status updates and identifying incomplete steps.

case_number.description: Unique case identifier for workflow tracking

completed_steps.description: List of intake steps that have been completed

current_step.description: Current step in the intake process

assigned_staff.description: Staff member responsible for the intake

priority_level.description: Priority level for intake processing (low, normal, high, urgent)

error_messages: Invalid case number: Provide a valid case number for tracking
Invalid current step: Specify a valid intake process step
Invalid staff assignment: Provide a valid staff member identifier
Invalid priority level: Use low, normal, high, or urgent
Invalid target date: Provide date in ISO 8601 format or future date
usage: Provide case number, completed steps, current step, and assigned staff. Optionally set priority level and target completion date. The tool tracks progress and provides workflow management.

estimated_completion.description: Estimated completion date based on progress

workflow_status.description: Overall workflow status (on_track, delayed, at_risk, complete)
